H0.text: With what is FIFA usually associated. Soccer

H1.text: With what is FIFA usually associated. Sports

H2.text: With what is FIFA usually associated. International Competitions

H3.text: With what is FIFA usually associated. Footbal

A4.text: FIFA is an international self-regulatory governing body of association football, beach football, and futsal.

A5.text: It is responsible for organising and promoting football's major international tournaments, notably the World Cup which began in 1930, and the Women's World Cup which commenced in 1991.

A8.text: The FIFA World Cup has become the world's most widely viewed sporting event, with the 2022 tournament estimated to be watched by 5 billion people, more than 60% of the global population.

A9.text: The FIFA Confederations Cup was contested by the winners of all six continental championships, the current FIFA World Cup champions, and the country which was hosting the next World Cup.

A10.text: FIFA headquarters are located in ZÃ¼rich, Switzerland.

A11.text: There are 211 national associations affiliated with FIFA and their continental confederations.
